response.summary: An information systems engineer in love with software science, ready to face challenges in order to build high impact products and empower teams.
response.skills: Software Development, Requirements Analysis, Agile & Waterfall Methodologies, Web Applications, Web Services, Technical Documentation, JavaScript, Node.js, MongoDB, Microsoft SQL Server, .NET Framework, Software Architecture, Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC), ASP.NET MVC, Webpack, Express.js, Angular, Git, Functional Specifications, Team Leadership

profile_positions.description:
- Directed Tech Services team to achieve performance, training and client delighting goals by end of the periods.
- Coordinated resource allocation matters joined with Service Delivery leads to provide proper resources for current and future projects.
- Mentored and trained team members to enhance hard and soft skills to fulfill customized development plans.
- Develop features for real estate and realtor agent systems.
profile_positions.title: Team Manager

profile_positions.description:
- Analyzed and picked up functional and technical requirements to process and export bulk data and files for social security data systems.
- Headed software deliveries between environments, by solving integration conflicts and guiding my team to deploy artifacts but also helping with their technical issues.
- Modeled and developed backend modules to process bulk data and files.
- Designed and developed web user interfaces to handle imports and exports for bulk data, and to do payments and queries.
- Investigated at change-product impacts to design test-strategies joined to affected areas to organize deploy execution plans.
profile_positions.title: Senior Developer Engineer

profile_positions.description:
- Developed features to manage real estate information focused in geographical analysis for new markets, by implementing data models, web user interfaces and layers (data access, business logic, web APIs, controllers).
- Researched and integrated a dedicated maps server to work joined to a web platform.
- Influenced my team to understand some software engineering concepts and to apply them on their code for a quality product attempt.
- Examined requirements to propose and test solution alternatives in technologies or communications for a real estate information system.
profile_positions.title: Senior Analyst and Developer

profile_positions.description:
- Picked up user stories to create a claims-and-complaints system focused in telecommunication services.
- Developed and supported a web application by implementing forms, queries, data tables and charts for a claims-and-complaints system.
profile_positions.title: Software Developer Engineer

profile_positions.description:
- Broke down use-case specifications about a patient health manager system to plan and develop database models, frontend and backend modules and unit testing.
-  Guided and supported developer teams with their new developments by offering technical and product information.
- Implemented database models and developed frontend and backend modules to build a patient-health manager system.
- Researched OLAP technologies to create an interface to show and treat indicators.
profile_positions.title: Senior Programmer

profile_positions.description:
- Coded features specified in use cases documents for a patient-health manager system.
- Wrote technical and functional documentation.
- Examined and corrected bugs.
profile_positions.title: Junior Programmer

company.name: Novo/Scale is now Thirdera
company.description:
Novo/Scale is now Thirdera, a global services provider that uses ServiceNow to help enterprises unlock their business and customer workflows in the cloud through digitization and automation. Thirdera brings together the power of the ServiceNow platform and its limitless potential across the world of work. Our architects, developers, consultants, designers, and project managers help our customers transform, get more from ServiceNow, and unlock hidden potential. We are ushering in the next era of transformation, digitization, automation, and partner expectation, all with and at the speed of NOW. Visit our website to learn more: https://www.thirdera.com/
____________________________________________________________________
Our mission is to make our customers'​ cloud journey seamless, effective, and easy while avoiding inefficiency, redundancy, and waste. Our talented global delivery team offers services and support that fit your priorities and budget. Whether you're looking to implement, optimize, or extend ServiceNow, we will develop a solution that maximizes value while minimizing complexity. Our deep skill set includes: Managed Services, ITSM, ITOM, Platform, HR, CSM, Portal, Testing and QA – just to name a few! NovoScale has been working with ServiceNow for almost a decade and has delivered over 1000 projects primarily for global integrators. We are now working directly with customers and will use our extensive experience coupled with industry best practices and proprietary problem‑solving methods to help you achieve your business goals. NovoScale is here to help you achieve the maximum potential from your ServiceNow investment.
